## Info 
The goal of this project is to predict the next word when an incomplete sentence is given.

## App Interface
When the user enters part of a sentence in the give box then the next word prediction logic will get activated and the most probable anwsers will be displayed in the options. 

##  Results
When the options are displayed on the list, the user can choose the best answer.
